Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

VerifiedAccessLogs.description: The configuration options for AWS Verified Access instances.

properties.name: CloudWatchLogs
properties.description: Sends Verified Access logs to CloudWatch Logs.

type.description: Sends Verified Access logs to CloudWatch Logs.

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description: Indicates whether logging is enabled.

type.description: Indicates whether logging is enabled.

properties.name: LogGroup
properties.description: The ID of the CloudWatch Logs log group.

type.description: The ID of the CloudWatch Logs log group.

properties.name: IncludeTrustContext
properties.description: Include claims from trust providers in Verified Access logs.

type.description: Include claims from trust providers in Verified Access logs.

properties.name: KinesisDataFirehose
properties.description: Sends Verified Access logs to Kinesis.

type.description: Sends Verified Access logs to Kinesis.

properties.name: DeliveryStream
properties.description: The ID of the delivery stream.

type.description: The ID of the delivery stream.

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description: Indicates whether logging is enabled.

type.description: Indicates whether logging is enabled.

properties.name: LogVersion
properties.description: Select log version for Verified Access logs.

type.description: Select log version for Verified Access logs.

properties.name: S3
properties.description: Sends Verified Access logs to Amazon S3.

type.description: Sends Verified Access logs to Amazon S3.

properties.name: BucketName
properties.description: The bucket name.

type.description: The bucket name.

properties.name: BucketOwner
properties.description: The ID of the AWS account that owns the Amazon S3 bucket.

type.description: The ID of the AWS account that owns the Amazon S3 bucket.

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description: Indicates whether logging is enabled.

type.description: Indicates whether logging is enabled.

properties.name: Prefix
properties.description: The bucket prefix.

type.description: The bucket prefix.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of trust provider.

type.description: The description of trust provider.

properties.name: DeviceTrustProviderType
properties.description: The type of device-based trust provider.

type.description: The type of device-based trust provider.

properties.name: TrustProviderType
properties.description: The type of trust provider (user- or device-based).

type.description: The type of trust provider (user- or device-based).

properties.name: UserTrustProviderType
properties.description: The type of user-based trust provider.

type.description: The type of user-based trust provider.

properties.name: VerifiedAccessTrustProviderId
properties.description: The ID of the trust provider.

type.description: The ID of the trust provider.

VerifiedAccessTrustProviderId.description: The ID of the AWS Verified Access trust provider.

resource.description: The AWS::EC2::VerifiedAccessInstance resource creates an AWS EC2 Verified Access Instance.

attributes.description: The AWS::EC2::VerifiedAccessInstance resource creates an AWS EC2 Verified Access Instance.
